Title: Dragon Ball: Sleeping Princess in Devil's Castle
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Akira Toriyama (original work), Yoshifumi Yûki (composition), Keiji Terui (screenplay)
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Tôru Furuya, Mami Koyama, Mayumi Tanaka
Plot: Goku and Krillin want to be trained in the martial arts by the great Master Roshi. The only way he will agree to train them is if they go to Devil's Castle to find the Sleeping Princess, who is being held prisoner by Count Lucifer, and bring her back to his island.
